name: Keen Sight
title: Tighnari: Keen Sight
desc: Mistakes are part of learning... However, these mistakes should be corrected upon being discovered.
inPlayDescription: When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Vijnana Suffusion, the character's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Charged Attack costs 1 less <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Unaligned Element.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Tighnari to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Tighnari, equip this card.After Tighnari equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Vijnana-Phala Mine once.When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Vijnana Suffusion, the character's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Charged Attack costs 1 less <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Unaligned Element.(You must have Tighnari in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
